actions: Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism.
Promotes urination and leaches out Dampness, strengthens the Spleen and harmonizes the Middle Jiao.
With Bai Zhu, strengthens the Spleen and resolves Dampness.
Tonifies the Spleen, nourishes Stomach Yin, stops diarrhea, tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
With Bai Zhu and Fu Ling, for Spleen Deficiency with loose watery stools .
Expels Dampness, alleviates discharge and treats leukorrhea and diarrhea.
Calms the Liver, benefits Yin, anchors Floating Yang and prevents leakage of fluids.
With Long gu and Bai Shao, for headache, dizziness and tinnitus and other symptoms associated with Yin Deficiency with Yang Rising.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang, strengthens Jing and Blood, regulates the Chong and Ren channels and stabilizes the Dai Channel.
Dredges Liver Qi, releases Stagnation, stops pain and conducts Heat out from below.
Astringes the Intestines, stops diarrhea, contains the Blood and stops bleeding.
Astringes leakage of Blood and stops bleeding.

symptoms: The discharge may be white, yellow, red or red and white
